body: Horrible wounds, whether on yourself or your enemies, make your blood sing.
name: Gore Fiend
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Half-Orcs/New Racial Rules/Half-Orc Feats/Gore Fiend

sections.body: Half-orc or orc, rage class feature.
sections.name: Prerequisites

sections.body: When you are raging and you confirm a critical hit with a melee weapon or a critical hit is confirmed on you (whether by a melee weapon, spell, or ranged weapon), you regain 1 round of rage (up to your maximum for the day). You can only gain this benefit once per round.
sections.name: Benefit
